name: Powershell Exec, Reverse Hop HTTP/HTTPS Stager
author: Spencer McIntyre
skape <mmiller@hick.org>
sf <stephen_fewer@harmonysecurity.com>
OJ Reeves
scriptjunkie <scriptjunkie@scriptjunkie.us>
bannedit <bannedit@metasploit.com>
hdm <x@hdm.io>
description:
Execute an x86 payload from a command via PowerShell.

Tunnel communication over an HTTP or HTTPS hop point. Note that you must first upload
data/hop/hop.php to the PHP server you wish to use as a hop.
